text: Apani bale dinah amara palanakarta kebalamatra aslila bisayasamuha harama karechena ya prakasya o aprakasya ebam harama karechena gonaha, an'yaya-atyacara allahara sathe emana bastuke ansidara kara, tini yara kona, sanada abatirna karenani ebam allahara prati emana katha aropa kara, ya tomara jana na.
